blogs.title: My New Blog
blogs.body: Yes I'm fucking scared sometimes but believe me, I'm stronger and more deadly than you can think off...

blogs.title: 2023 Election Result...
blogs.body:
If God no purnish INEC chairman, na em be say we don remain oooo 
LP: 45million votes 
PDP: 12million votes 
APC: 4thousand votes 
Yet dem say na APC win
blogs.author: Mr. Temple

blogs.title: How I met him...
blogs.body: So there is this guy that i normally follow one of my male friend to go and see in his house, if anybody had told me that i will oneday be in a compromising romantic position with this guy, i will doubt it totally, but life sha... It is what it is!!!
blogs.author: Mhiz Esther

blogs.body: I thank God almighty for his undying love in my life and for his infinite mercies upon my life...
